acceptPrivacyPolicy: By creating an account you accept our
completeRegistration.registerCompleteSub: You have successfully confirmed your email ({{email}}). Please complete your details to complete the registration.
confirmEmail.couldNotConfirm: Your email address could not be confirmed
confirmEmail.couldNotConfirmText: We could not confirm your email address. Please request a confirmation email again.
confirmEmail.redirect: You will then be redirected automatically.
connectGoogleAccount.explain: An account already exists for the email address ({{email}}) of your Google account. Please log in with your existing password to link the two accounts.
connectGoogleAccount.headline: Connect Your Account to Google
forgotPasswordSubHeadline: Enter your email below, and we'll send you a link to reset your password. Check your spam or junk folder if you don't see the email.
formik.privacyPolicy: You must accept the terms and conditions
loginError: Your email or password is incorrect
loginSubHeadline: Enter your email below to login to your account
name: Name
passwordRequestedCaption: Note: This e-mail will only be sent if the e-mail address is registered in our system.
passwordRequestedSubheadline: We have sent you an email with a link to reset your password. If you have not received an email, please check your spam folder.
passwordResetError: Your request is either invalid or has expired. Please start the process again.
registerSubHeadline: Enter your email to create an account. You will then receive an email with a confirmation link.
registerSuccess.alert: We have sent you an email with a link to confirm your email. If you have not received an email, please check your spam folder.
registerSuccess.headline: Registration successful
resendEmailConfirmation.emailResend: Another email has been sent to {{lastSendEmail}}. Please check your inbox.
settings.language.description: Choose your preferred language for the application interface.
settings.language.title: Language Settings
settings.profile.description: Manage your profile information and account settings.
settings.profile.title: Profile Settings
settings.profilePicture.cropDescription: Adjust the position and zoom of your profile picture. The image will be cropped to a circular shape.
settings.profilePicture.dragDrop: Drag and drop an image here
settings.profilePicture.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is 5MB.
settings.profilePicture.hint: Upload a new picture to replace your current profile picture
settings.profilePicture.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload an image file.
settings.profilePicture.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF, WEBP
settings.profilePicture.uploadError: An error occurred while uploading the image.
